long_description: The REI Muy Grande shower kit is perfect if you want more carrying capacity, easy access and multiple pockets. Carry a full-range of grooming essentials, including household-size bottles. REI Muy Grande kit conveniently stands up for counter-top use or hangs from its own stow-away hook to free up counter space. Zippered panel opening provides secure closure. Quart-size, clear zip pouch holds liquids and is removable for easy airport screening; it nests nicely inside kit for use at destination. Removable roll-up pouch protects delicate items such as jewelry, or separates dry goods from wet areas of kit. Multiple organizer features keep toiletries neat; mesh pockets accommodate household-volume bottles. Interior zippered pocket has a water-resistant liner to separate dry items from wet. Includes compact mirror made from break-resistant plastic; rip-and-stick fasteners ensure easy removal. Exterior zip pocket provides quick access to small items; carry handle allows easy kit handling. Durable nylon resists abrasion, tears, scuffs and punctures.
short_description: The REI Muy Grande shower kit is perfect if you want more carrying capacity, easy access and multiple pockets. Carry a full-range of grooming essentials, including household-size bottles.
